explains: v. 落下；累垮；减少；垂下（眼睛）；中途卸客（drop 的现在分词）
wordGroup: dropping point 滴点；掉落点；空投点

sentences.en: He felt hot tears dropping onto his fingers.
sentences.cn: 他感到热泪滴在他的手指上。

sentences.en: We were still playing at war – dropping leaflets instead of bombs.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然在把战争当儿戏–在空投传单而不是在投炸弹。

sentences.en: Standards of morality seem to be dropping.
